mapper.insert: insert into admin(adminnum, adminid, adminpwd, adminname, admintel, adminemail, adminregdate) values(adminnum_sq.nextval, #{adminId}, #{adminPwd}, #{adminName}, #{adminTel}, #{adminEmail}, sysdate)
insert into airport(airportnum, iata, city, continent, latitude, longitude, cityimg) values(airport_sq.nextval, #{IATA}, #{city}, #{continent}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{cityImg})
insert into product(productnum, depart, arrive, price, productcnt, sale, regdate) values(productnum_sq.nextval, #{depart}, #{arrive}, #{price}, #{productCnt}, #{productSale}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select productnum, depart, arrive, price, productcnt, sale AS productSale, to_char(regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') regdate from product where productnum =#{productNum}
mapper.update: update product set depart=#{depart}, arrive=#{arrive}, price=#{price}, sale=#{productSale} where productnum=#{productNum}
mapper.insert: insert into flight(flightnum, airplanename, productnum, departtime, arrivetime, sale) values(flightnum_sq.nextval, #{airplaneName}, #{productNum}, #{departTime}, #{arriveTime}, #{flightSale})
insert into noticeboard(noticenum, noticetype, subject, content, hit, regdate) values(noticeboardnum_sq.nextval, #{noticeType}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{hit}, sysdate)

insert into event(eventnum, eventname, eventthumbnail, eventimg, eventcontent, eventcompany, startdate, enddate, regdate) values(eventnum_sq.nextval, #{eventName}, #{eventThumbnail}, #{eventImg}, #{eventContent}, #{eventCompany}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, sysdate)
